item.title: PodRoom - Podcast social networking platform

Encryption is hard to get right and very easy to get wrong, that‚Äôs why we built Ubiq, an entirely API-based SaaS platform that enables developers to build encryption directly into their applications with a few lines of code and 2 API calls.
